question.body: Which of the following are functions of the urinary system? (choose all that are correct). (note I would like to have more than one correct answer that they can choose - all are correct)

response.feedback: Yes, the kidneys control the loss of hydrogen and bicarbonate ions to maintain pH of the body.
Yes, urine is mostly water and the kidney control how much water leaves the body everyday.
Yes, the kidneys are critical for removing wastes from the blood
Yes, the kidneys control the loss of electrolytes from the body via urine.

part.hint: The urinary system as several important functions.
